messages:
Name: Roland Sallai
Nationality: Hungary
Date of Birth: May 22, 1997
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Freiburg
Bundesliga clubs played for: Freiburg
Freiburg's Roland Sallai has appeared in two Bundesliga games in 2024/2025 overall and played 44 minutes. Both those appearances came off the bench as a substitute.
Sallai last appeared in a competition game on September 1, playing 27 minutes for Freiburg against Bayern München in a 2-0 loss.
A trip to Heidenheim on September 21 is the next Bundesliga game for Freiburg.
In last season's Bundesliga, Sallai played in 27 games for Freiburg and scored three goals.
Sallai joined Freiburg in August 2018 from APOEL, for whom he made 29 league appearances in total, scoring nine goals.

Sallai made a great impression on his Bundesliga debut for Freiburg on September 22, 2018. The midfielder scored a goal in his first-ever appearance in the competition against Wolfsburg, at the age of 21 years and 123 days. Overall, in his Bundesliga career, he has played 138 times in the competition, with 20 goals and 10 assists.
